description: Myla Javik is a 23-year-old bisexual human mechanic living in the desert town of Bago on Jakku.  Tough and tomboyish, yet romantic and a daydreamer, she's defined by her strong work ethic, fueled by a hatred for the Empire and a longing for love.  Despite her difficult circumstances, she maintains a hopeful spirit, finding solace in her work, her repair droid, and occasional cantina visits.
